snippet.title: The Faces of Evil & Wand of Gamelon Remastered (Trailer)
snippet.description:
Yep, so after four years of work in my spare time, I decided to re-imagine the Zelda CD-i games for PC. EDIT: I have removed the downloads. However, a fan patched version has been uploaded that I highly recommend everyone check out. 

https://archive.org/details/foer-wogr-patched-12-9-20

I wrote up an FAQ if you want more information.
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Ktxy1_bkmK5cKw-GWYnEKBw-RfeWKTKKEbX6A5H12wY/edit



If you'd like to support me or talk to me about these games or any game, I run a gaming Discord server that I'd love more friendly faces to join:
https://discord.com/invite/bGCm8RK


Enjoy and thanks for playing!
